segments.text: What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've got a suit , a woolen sweater and a white shirt to wash .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , let me see . This white shirt can be washed in water with hands , but this suit and the woolen sweater should be dry-cleaned .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's OK . But that must be costly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , the cost for dry-cleaning is three times of that for ordinary laundering . But for suits and sweaters , you can only take them to the dry cleaners ' .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my wife just threw them into the washer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did it ever shrink or fade ? Generally speaking , the dark-colored clothes always fade away gradually .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . The woolen sweater shrunk in the wash .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Never mind . You can leave them to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , thanks . You know , I know little about this , so please tell me something that I should pay more attention to when I do washing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's very simple . Divide the clothes by the colors , and wash them in cold water . If you've got some special stains on them like sugar , coffee or something else please let the dry cleaner know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll keep that in mind . And how much is it altogether ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That will be 80 Yuan altogether . Here is your invoice .
segments.speaker: S1
